title: Android 10 Ambient Display Customization
content:
Since the update, ambient display (i.e. the "always on" display that shows even when screen is powered off) is showing what's playing in huge text. What a poor design! Do I have to tell everyone what I'm listening to?

Unless I'm absolutely misled, I saw there is absolutely zero customization option for what's showing on the ambient display. Huge customer trust buster.

1. Feature request: please add ambient display customization.

2. I know how to adjust other settings, including shutting off ambient display. Just add the feature. Thanks.
